section.title: Data Structures
section.descr: The following list constitutes DSSL's most important data structures. Note that all of these structures should be considered as opaque types and used only as arguments to DSSL API functions.

topic.title: CapEnv
topic.descr: This is the main structure in DSSL framework that links all the DSSL components together and with libpcap capture adapter.

topic.title: DSSL_Env
topic.descr: This structure stores global SSL decryption environment data such as a list of SSL server addresses and SSL session cache for SSL session resumption.

topic.title: DSSL_Session
topic.descr: Represents a single SSL session.

topic.title: DSSL_ServerInfo
topic.descr: Represents SSL server data: IP address, RSA private key, keyfile password, etc.

topic.title: TcpSession
topic.descr: Represents a single TCP session. This structure is used by DSSL's TCP reassemly code.

topic.title: DSSL_Pkt
topic.descr: Represents a captured network packet. This structure is used by DSSL's TCP reassemly code.

topic.title: NM_PacketDir enum
topic.descr: Defines a packet directions within TCP session.

topic.title: DSSL_EVENT_XXX codes
topic.descr: Session event codes used in CapEnvSessionCallback callback.

topic.title: CapEnvSessionCallback
topic.prototype: typedef void (*CapEnvSessionCallback)( struct CapEnv_* env, TcpSession* sess, char event );
topic.descr: A prototype of CapEnv session event callback function. This callback function is called every time CapEnv is about to create a new session or an existing session is about to be closed.

param-list.param: CapEnv instance that fired this session event.
Event's TCP session.
An event code - either DSSL_EVENT_NEW_SESSION or DSSL_EVENT_SESSION_CLOSING.

topic.title: DataCallbackProc
topic.prototype: typedef void (*DataCallbackProc)( NM_PacketDir dir, void* user_data, u_char* data, uint32_t len, DSSL_Pkt* last_packet );
topic.descr: A prototype of the session data callback function.

param-list.param: Packet direction (ePacketDirFromClient or ePacketDirFromServer NM_PacketDir enum value)
Application-defined data associated with the TCP or SSL session. See SessionSetCallback function.
Pointer to the reassembled / decrypted packet payload data.
Length of data in bytes.
Pointer to the last reassembled network packet structure. Data from this packet triggered the event.

topic.title: ErrorCallbackProc
topic.prototype: typedef void (*ErrorCallbackProc)( void* user_data, int error_code );
topic.descr: A prototype of the session error callback function.

param-list.param: Application-defined data associated with the TCP or SSL session. See SessionSetCallback function.
One of DSSL_E_XXX error codes.

section.title: DSSL Framework API Functions
section.descr: This section documents DSSL public instance management, initialization and data processing API.

topic.title: CapEnvCreate
topic.prototype: CapEnv* CapEnvCreate( pcap_t* adapter, int sessionTableSize, uint32_t cache_timeout_interval );
topic.descr: Creates a CapEnv structure and initialize it with pcap_t capture handle, TCP session table size and SSL session timeout interval in seconds.

topic.title: CapEnvDestroy
topic.descr: Destroys a CapEnv instance and frees allocated memory.

topic.title: CapEnvCapture
topic.descr: Process packets captured by calling by pcap_loop routine on env's pcap handle.

topic.title: CapEnvSetSessionCallback
topic.descr: Sets a callback function that is executed every time a TCP session is created or destroyed within the given CapEnv instance.

topic.title: CapEnvFindDSSL_ServerInfo
topic.prototype: DSSL_ServerInfo* CapEnvFindDSSL_ServerInfo( CapEnv* env, struct in_addr* server_ip, uint16_t server_port );
topic.descr: Searches env's SSL server list for a server by its IP address and port number.

param-list.param: CapEnv instance to search within.
Target server's IP address.
Target server's TCP port number.

topic.returnval: Returns the looked for DSSL_ServerInfo structure, or NULL if no such server found.

topic.title: CapEnvSetSSL_ServerInfo
topic.descr: Adds SSL server data to CapEnv's DSSL decryption module.

param-list.param: CapEnv instance for which the SSL server info is set
Server IP address
Server TCP port number
Server private key file path.
Key file password. Can be NULL if the keyfile is not encrypted.

topic.returnval: Returns 0 if successful, non-zero error code otherwise.

section.title: SSL Traffic Decryption API
section.descr: SSL decryption layer has its own API that can be used as a stand-alone interface, bypassing the CapEnv TCP reassembly module. It is designed for applications that have their own TCP reassembly layer.

topic.title: DSSL_EnvCreate
topic.descr: Creates a DSSL decryption environment object.

param-list.param: Defines the size of a hash table used to store previously negotiated SSL sessions in order to handle SSL session resumption.
A SSL session timeout value in seconds. If a session is not resumed within this interval, it gets removed from the cache.

topic.title: DSSL_EnvDestroy
topic.descr: Destroys DSSL_Env object.

topic.title: DSSL_EnvSetServerInfo
topic.descr: Adds SSL server data to DSSL_Evn server table.

param-list.param: CapEnv instance for which the SSL server info is set
Server IP address
Server TCP port number
Server private key file path.
Key file password. Can be NULL if the keyfile is not encrypted.

topic.returnval: Returns 0 if successful, non-zero error code otherwise.

topic.title: DSSL_SessionInit
topic.prototype: void DSSL_SessionInit( DSSL_Env* env, DSSL_Session* s, DSSL_ServerInfo* si );
topic.descr: Initialize DSSL_Session object.

topic.title: DSSL_SessionDeInit
topic.descr: Destroy DSSL_Session internal structures. Call this method before freeing the DSSL_Session object.

topic.title: DSSL_SessionSetCallback
topic.prototype: void DSSL_SessionSetCallback( DSSL_Session* sess, SessionCallbackProc data_callback, ErrorCallbackProc error_callback, void* user_data );
topic.descr: Set the data and error callback routines for DSSL_Session object.

param-list.param: DSSL_Session object
A callback routine that is be called when new data (SSL payload) is decrypted and ready to be processed.
A error callback routine that is called when an error occurs.
User-defined application data associated with this session.

topic.title: DSSL_SessionProcessData
topic.prototype: int DSSL_SessionProcessData( DSSL_Session* sess, NM_PacketDir dir, u_char* data, uint32_t len );
topic.descr: This is a main SSL layer entry point that process decrypts SSL data and returns decrypted payload through DSSL_Session data callback routine.

param-list.param: DSSL_Session object
Packet direction. Can be one of the following: ePacketDirFromClient for client-to-server packet or ePacketDirFromServer for server-to-client packet.
Packet data, starting from the TCP payload. Note that it is the caller's responsibility to strip lower-level network protocol headers (Ethernet, IP, TCP).
Data size in bytes
